LOCATION.MIN: Location must have at least 3 characters
LOCATION.MAX: Location must have a maximum of 30 characters

BIRTHDAY.MIN: Birthday must have at least 3 characters
BIRTHDAY.MAX: Birthday must have a maximum of 64 characters

AVATAR.MIN: Avatar must have at least 3 characters
AVATAR.MAX: Avatar must have a maximum of 64 characters

NICK.MIN: The nick must have at least 3 characters
NICK.MAX: The nick must have a maximum of 100 characters
NICK.REPEAT: This nickname is already in use

EMAIL.MIN: The email must have a minimum of 3 characters
EMAIL.MAX: The email must have a maximum of 255 characters
EMAIL.EMAIL_REPEAT: This email address is already in use

PASSWORD.MIN: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters

PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION.MIN: The password confirmation must have a minimum of 8 characters

MESSSAGE.LONG: The message cannot be larger than 10.000 characters

POLL.PAST: The finish date of the poll can't be in the past

POST.LONG: Post can't be longer than 10.000 characters

TITLE: Title
CONFIRM_DELETE_POLL: Are you sure you want to delete the poll:
CONFIRM_DELETE_TOPIC: Are you sure you want to delete the topic
CONFIRM_DELETE_POST: Are you sure you want to delete the post by:

ALLOW_MP: Allow other users to send you private messages
ALLOW_MUSIC: Allow category music to be played
